response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $800,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. We propose to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a reduced cost. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
